attributes.action: Place traffic cameras on St James lane in Coventry.
attributes.background: Cars speed on this road daily and over take on the wrong side of the road. A man was recently hit on the road by a car and the car sped of. He is on life support at the moment with multiple broken bones.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of your local authority and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
